website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S5 is the most powerful phone AT&T has to offer, but of course AT&T had to interfere a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong net work i ask for 02
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Samsung Galaxy s5 Tuesday it arrived Wednesday 20th June 2017 I was expected to get an sim free phone but it was an Vodafone I wasn't happy my husband had to go out and by £20 credit but when he tried to get me abolt on it took half of my credit so he had to go and get me another £10 voucher not happy at all I've got to wait 2 days for Vodafone to change my sim back to my 02 number but it's still a Vodafone phone
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Honest opinion..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the gold colour that I was shown on the picture I received a navy blue back cover with a gold rim around the phone I was slightly annoyed at first but started to like the phone they way it came. The quality is excellent and I love everything about the phone and it was super fast delivery got it in 2 days '' I would recommend it to anyone who's thinking of buying it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have a slight problem with this Phone so I contacted Samsung who could not help over the phone and advised me to go to their support shop in Edinburgh which I did . The technician checked the phone and informed me that he could not work on the phone as it was made in China and not for the UK. As the phone is only two year old I think I should be refunded my money. Please advise soonest

customer_reviews.title: but I am really delighted with my phone
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious purchasing a phone and not seeing it in the flesh, but I am really delighted with my phone. It was delivered very promptly and it is super. I really would recommend it and I would have no problem recommending this phone. 10/10 for Amazon once again. Thank you xoxox

customer_reviews.title: No probs still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Love these phones any galaxy phone and I'm fine. Cheap cheerful and very functional. Value for money now s5 s6 are still very good phones with great cameras and memory. I save £££'s by buying an older model with all the same basic functionality as modern versions. They still have hd screen 15 mp camera video calls email Internet fingerprint I'd voice recognition. Also if you break it or lose it, it's £120 or something, instead of £700.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine, was a birthday present for my mum. After a few days she found it couldn't do certain things, like no GPS, couldn't use maps. She uses these alot. Very disappointed. Now have a new phone for her. Wast off money and time.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying this product from seller CASKY UK
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I could. After using for 1 month realized that sound quality of speaker was horrible. After 4 months found that battery is duplicate and has swollen. I didn't realize this and kept on using for 15 days. This could have been harmful, luckily escaped. Avoid buying this product from seller - CASKY UK

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 SIM-Free Smartphone - Gold
product_meta.description:
The Samsung Galaxy S5 has a fingerprint scanner built into the home button so only you can access your device. There's also built in fitness software and a heart rate monitor. It's the best phone around at improving your health. The battery inside the S5 is 2,800mAh in size, giving 21 hours of talk time and up to 390 hours of standby time. The processor is a top of the range quad core 2.5GHz Snapdragon 801, excellent for gaming. Android 4.4.2 KitKat is the software, and it's feature packed. The 5.1" Super AMOLED screen automatically adjusts to different lighting conditions. On the back is a 16MP camera and on the front is a 2MP one. Both are excellent. The S5's camera lets you take some pretty special photos. It'll actually focus in 0.3 seconds. That means your 16MP photos will always be in super sharp focus. It also has a special mode called high dynamic range mode. This picks out light and dark spots on photos in perfect detail. It even works on your videos. With 16GB of built-in memory and a microSD slot for memory cards up to 128GB (cards sold separately), there's plenty of space for videos. The Samsung Galaxy S5 is packed with the latest features, and Samsung also managed to make it water resistant. Into fitness and want to improve your health? The Galaxy S5 is ideal. It'll let you track your exercises, what food you've eaten, your weight and your stress levels. There's also an excellent Coach feature that helps keep you motivated and reach your fitness goals. On the back of the S5 is a built in heart rate monitor. This lets you track your fitness more accurately than ever before.

This does not mean that the warranty of Manufacturer is void. The product has full Manufacturer's or Network’s warranty.(see warranty terms & conditions).
